subject: Re: Order #SSN4553 confirmed
description_text:
Good Morning,
I hope you're well, I'm just emailing to find out a bit of information as to when this order will be shipped out. I'm located in the UK and noticed I ordered during the pre-sale. The website states that shipping would commence on the 15th December, is it likely that ill receive this within the usual shipping times listed on the website?I look forward to hearing back! Have a great day :)
Kind RegardsDan Bloxham    On Monday, 8 December 2025 at 17:30:41 GMT, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

conversations.body_text: Hi danielbloxham@sky. com,    This product has begun shipping in batches, with all pre-sale order shipments expected to be completed by the 18th.

Good Morning, I hope you’re well, I’m still awaiting a response for my email regarding my order. When are these shifters planned to be shipped out as they have just released according to your website. Many thanks Dan Bloxham

Good morning, I have just seen the response said on here. Apologies I was expecting it to come through on my email. Thank you for your response and I look forward to receiving my package!     Kind regards  Dan Bloxham
Hi danielbloxham@sky. com,       Hello, orders will be shipped out in the order they were placed this week.
